Room.Name: Farm Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a dirt farm road leading through the winery orchard.
Room.LongDescription: A large billboard stands beside the road and advertises wine as a healthy choice. The Chateau Richland Winery grows some of the best grapes in all of the Land of Mordor in the orchard you are presently passing through. The road appears to lead toward some farm buildings.
